mapper.insert: insert into single_activity_order_goods (id, order_no, goods_id, goods_code, goods_price, goods_number, goods_discount_number, goods_refund_number, activity_price, dis_amount, activity_id, platform_subsidy, shop_subsidy, is_delete, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goodsDiscountNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{goodsRefundNumber,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{activityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{platformSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shopSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
